title: Public Participation on New Budget
content: Residents of Kiambu County are invited to attend public forums to discuss the 2025/26 budget. The county treasury seeks feedback before final submission.

title: New Water Project Launched
content: The Ministry of Water has launched a clean water project benefiting 5,000 homes in Turkana. This is part of the national clean water agenda.

title: Ward Development Fund Increased
content: The Nairobi County Assembly has approved an increment in the Ward Development Fund, aimed at improving roads, schools, and dispensaries at ward level.

title: Citizens Petition for Health Reforms
content: A civic petition signed by over 10,000 Nairobi residents calls for improved staffing in public health centers across the city.

title: Open Data Portal Launched
content: The Council of Governors has launched a new open data platform where citizens can view county budgets, expenditures, and project performance.
